success.onBotOnline: [STATUS] All set up and good to go! {CLIENT_USERNAME} is now online!
success.onValidLanguage: [TASK] Language verified, successfully set language to [{LANGUAGE}].

warning.invalidLanguage: [TASK] Attempted to use an unsupported language [{LANGUAGE}]. Reverting back to default language [EN].

error.unavailable: [ERROR] A startup error has occured. Please make sure the bot is available.
error.startFailure: [ERROR] Could not start {CLIENT_USERNAME} due to a fatal error: {ERROR}
error.invalidPresence: [ERROR] Could not set activity presence due to: {ERROR}
